sentences.en: "Make the punishment fit the crime." How neat and tidy it sounded.
sentences.cn: “罪罚相当”，这听起来多么简洁。

sentences.en: After a good night's sleep I feel fighting fit again.
sentences.cn: 昨夜睡得很香，我又觉得自己精力充沛了。

sentences.en: can you fit any more water into the jug?.
sentences.cn: 你还能往水壶里再加点水吗？。

sentences.en: Consuming this amount of food could turn these fit players into fatties.
sentences.cn: 这些体格健壮的运动员吃这么多会变成胖子的。

sentences.en: He didn’t fit the conventional image of a banker.
sentences.cn: 他与传统的银行家形象不符。

sentences.en: he feels he should become tough to &B{fit in with} his friends.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己该强硬起来，好与朋友们保持一致。

sentences.en: He folded his long legs to fit under the table.
sentences.cn: 他把两条长腿蜷起来伸进桌下。

sentences.en: he had us all in fits.
sentences.cn: 他让我们大家都非常开心。

sentences.en: He was not a fit companion for their skipper that particular morning.
sentences.cn: 那天早晨，他没能和队长配合好。

sentences.en: He was then overcome by a terrible fit of coughing.
sentences.cn: 接着他便控制不住地剧烈咳嗽了一阵。

sentences.en: He was young, good-looking, and physically fit .
sentences.cn: 他年轻英俊，体格健壮。

sentences.en: He'd obviously kept himself fit despite his years of confinement.
sentences.cn: 显然，尽管监禁多年，他依旧保持着身体健康。

sentences.en: His clothes did not fit him very well .
sentences.cn: 他的衣服不是很合身。

sentences.en: I swim twice a week to try and keep fit .
sentences.cn: 我一周游两次泳以保持健康。

sentences.en: I wanted to put the wardrobe behind the door, but I don’t think it’ll fit.
sentences.cn: 我原想把衣橱放在门后，但可能放不下。

sentences.en: It's important to fit it the right way round.
sentences.cn: 将它安到正确位置上很重要。

sentences.en: Johnny has changed his image to fit the times.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼已经改变了他的形象以迎合时代潮流。

sentences.en: Police said the car fits the description of the stolen vehicle.
sentences.cn: 警方称这辆车符合对被盗车辆的描述。

sentences.en: Scientists often select facts to fit their theories.
sentences.cn: 科学家经常会挑选符合自己理论的事实。

sentences.en: She made a New Year's resolution to get fit.
sentences.cn: 她的新年决心是要保持身材健美。

sentences.en: She’s over eighty now, but still as fit as a fiddle (= very fit ) .
sentences.cn: 她现已年过八十，但身体依然很硬朗。

sentences.en: the cabin had been fitted out to a high standard.
sentences.cn: 船舱按高标准装配。

sentences.en: The crowd was too large to fit inside the hall.
sentences.cn: 人太多了，大厅里容不下。

sentences.en: the machine tends to go forward in fits and starts.
sentences.cn: 这机器往往是时断时续地前进。

sentences.en: The medical board would not pass him fit for General Service.
sentences.cn: 医疗卫生委员会不会批准他为全科医生。

sentences.en: The punishment should fit the crime.
sentences.cn: 罚需当罪。

sentences.en: The sash, kimono, and other garments were made to fit a child.
sentences.cn: 腰带、和服和其他衣服都是儿童款的。

sentences.en: There's something about the way he talks of her that doesn't fit.
sentences.cn: 他谈论她的样子有点不对劲。

sentences.en: They fitted a smoke alarm to the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 他们把烟雾报警器安装在天花板上。

sentences.en: they laughed fit to bust.
sentences.cn: 他们放声大笑。

sentences.en: they laughed fit to bust.

sentences.en: To stay fit off season, I play tennis or football.
sentences.cn: 为了在休赛期间保持状态，我常打网球或踢足球。

sentences.en: We should be able to fit one more in.
sentences.cn: 我们应该还能再装进一个。

sentences.en: why did the company see fit to give you the job?.
sentences.cn: 为什么这家公司认为把这份工作给你很合适？。

sentences.en: You might be able to fit some small flowering plants between the larger bushes.
sentences.cn: 你或许可以在较大的灌木之间种些小的开花植物。

sentences.en: You must be very fit if you do so much running.
sentences.cn: 如果你经常这样跑步，身体肯定很健康。
